diff_hunk:
@@ -8426,6 +8426,89 @@ def test_numpy_index(self):
             self.assertFalse(isinstance(idx, int))
             self.assertEqual(x[idx], x[int(idx)])
 
+    @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_NUMPY, "Numpy not found")
body: So... I suppose this test is a reasonable smoketest, but what I *really* want tested, is that now a Torch tensor can successfully be used by the numba library. I don't see that tested here, and that doesn't seem good!
